dcterms:description: The IQiYi dataset records about 70 million user interactions for 4 million videos, including views and comments. It is a very sparse and noisy dataset, and user retention is set as the average number of days users log in the next week.
dcterms:title: IQiYi

dcterms:description: The ML-1m dataset is a benchmark dataset commonly used in sequential recommender systems, which records 6,014 users' scores for 3,417 movies. User retention is calculated from the perspective of month.
dcterms:title: ML-1m
